Package ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.selenium.api.widget

Annotation Interface NeedToScrollIntoView

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(METHOD) public @interface NeedToScrollIntoView
This a mark of a method implemented by a subclass of the Widget. It means that it is necessary to scroll a widget into view before any method marked by this annotation.

NOTE!

The scrolling is performed implicitly when:

- the subclass of the Widget implements ScrollsIntoView

- an instance of the Widget is received with SearchSupplier
